name: Lament (itch)
description:
Lament! A fast paced action-platformer where you play as a wolf with a buster sword!

UPDATE 3/31/2017

Lament is live on steam! check it out! Thanks to everyone for there feedback and support!:D This demo is dated and should not reflect the final product :D

http://store.steampowered.com/app/598340

UPDATE 2/20/2017

Things have been going great since the first demo release, and now with Lament being greenlit I am seriously buckling down to try and Polish it and put it out there! Thanks to everyone for there awesome feedback! I hope to have a release date very soon! For more info follow me or contact me @radcroc. Thanks again!

Demo Controls!

Movement - W, A, S, D

Attack/Jump - J,K

Special move(When available)- W + Attack

Also have controller support! (Only tested with Xbox controllers)
